transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ya good afternoon sir.
Customer: Good afternoon good afternoon aaj busy hai pura busy hai abhi aap busy hai sir.
Executive: Ha busy hai nahi socha idhar se wo kam nahi hai.
Executive: Okay to sir aaj possible hai ki aap free ho payenge.
Customer: Yes sir but kal to hamara closing day hai then abhi to hum busy rahenge aap bataye agar agar aaj possible nahi rahega to main kal aapko call back kar lunga.
Customer: Theek hai aaj possible nahi hai abhi tak kam nahi hai sab ho gaya.
Executive: Okay sir but ek aapka hamare pass request aaya hai ki aapko local language ke liye ek employee chahiye jo aapko cheez se main sir sorry for that ki hamare sath
Executive: Sir sir listen to me sir hum aapko wo provide nahi kar sakte sir kyunki maine sir kal hi aapke sath explain kiya tha ki sir ek bar agar main aapko connect kara bhi do aapke local employee se okay agar hamare pass available ho to but sir aapko to deal sir all over india karna hai na pan india karna hai theek hai to aapko to sir ya to fir hindi mein fir ya english mein comfortable hona padega na customer ko samajhne ke liye.
Customer: Problem nahi hai ek mahine ke baad ek staff ko appoint dega staff hai usme problem nahi hai.
Executive: Okay so so so sir aapko isme manage karna padega for that time ki ya to fir aap english mein coordinate kariye ya hindi mein coordinate kariye jab tak aap employee ko assign nahi kar lete okay.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay so sir kal hamari kya timing rahegi hamari call ki aap mujhe ek final time set
Customer: Yes sir sunday ko main aapko call karunga i will call you back on sunday what will be the suitable time sir
Customer: Hindi morning.
Executive: Okay sir okay okay i will connect you.
Executive: Okay sir aapki ye jo request aayi hai main use close kar deta hu close kar do sir
Customer: Kya?
Executive: Ye jo aapki request aayi hai sir hamare pass local speaking ke liye maine aapko uske bare mein explain kar diya hum use aapko provide nahi kar payenge sorry for that sir to aapki ye jo request hai ise main close kar do sir
Customer: Request kya?
Executive: Ya ye jo aapki request aayi hai hamare pass isko main close kar do na.
Customer: Ha close kar dijiye sir dusra aadmi ko arrange karne ke liye request hai.
Executive: Ha ha ha.
Customer: But dusra aadmi nahi sir hamare head office mein koi bhi malayalam speaking aadmi nahi hai sir.
Customer: Pahle din ke baad ek aadmi bola tumhara head office mein ek malayalam aadmi arrange karega.
Executive: Okay sir sir jo aapke local area mein jo hamare employee hai na wo aapke malayalam mein speak kar sakte hain okay but jo head office se aapke account manage hoti hai to hamare yahan malayalam speaking koi bhi employee nahi hai okay kyunki sir aapko deal bhi to sir all over india karna hai na to agar hum sir keval malayalam mein agar comfortable rahenge to fir hum apne client ko kaise deal kar payenge.
Customer: Ha samajhta hu samajhta hu.
Executive: Got it sir?
Customer: Malum hai malum hai.
Executive: Okay okay theek hai sir main aapki request ko close kar deta hu okay.
Customer: Okay okay.
Executive: Okay okay thank you so much sir main aapko kal connect karta hu okay theek hai theek hai okay okay thank you so much.
Customer: Okay thank you so much.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a Malayalam-speaking employee.

Resolution:

- Executive explained the unavailability of such employee.
- Executive suggested managing in English/Hindi temporarily.
- Executive closed the customer's request.

Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer on Sunday.

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- local language, employee, request, closing
